description: Parameter descriptors for mergers and acquisitions tools

parameters.description: List of company identifiers to find all M&A transactions where the company was involved as buyer, seller, or target. Returns transaction_ids for use with other M&A tools.
common_mistakes: Using this tool to get detailed transaction information (use get_merger_info_from_transaction_id instead)
Not using the returned transaction_ids with other M&A tools
Expecting financial details (this tool only provides transaction_ids and basic info)
Making separate calls for each company instead of batching

parameters.description: The specific transaction ID for comprehensive M&A transaction information. Must be obtained from get_mergers_from_identifiers first.
common_mistakes: Using company identifier instead of transaction_id
Not finding transaction_id first using get_mergers_from_identifiers
Expecting this to work without a valid transaction_id
Guessing transaction_id values instead of looking them up

parameters.description: Single company identifier (not array) for the company whose advisors you want to find in a specific transaction.
common_mistakes: Using array format instead of single identifier
Using this without first finding the transaction_id from get_mergers_from_identifiers

parameters.description: The specific transaction ID for the M&A deal. Must be obtained from get_mergers_from_identifiers first.
common_mistakes: Not providing transaction_id (this parameter is required)
Using company name instead of transaction_id
Guessing transaction_id instead of looking it up first
Using transaction_id from a different company's transaction
